Posts.Content: On Nov 08, 2016 2:11 PM Sohare wrote: I have lobular breast cancer and was wondering if there are any new treatments for this cancer type For invasive lobular breast cancer, the first and foremost treatment option is surgery. The doctor decides what kind of surgery would be the best for the patient. Also, the type of surgery would depend on the stage and grade of cancer and the location of the cancer. Usually surgery is the first treatment and it the tumor is large or has spread too far, post-surgery chemotherapy or hormaone therapy may also be advised.Â
Posts.Title: Lobular cancer
